meanings.definition: A cosmetic surgical procedure to improve the appearance of the face.
meanings.sent1: She decided to get facelifts to look younger.
meanings.sent2: Many celebrities opt for facelifts to maintain a youthful look.
meanings.sent3: After the facelifts, her friends joked that she looked like a new person.
meanings.sent4: The facelifts transformed her appearance like magic.
meanings.sent5: The facelifts gave her a fresh and rejuvenated look.

meanings.definition: To undergo a facelift surgery to enhance one's facial features.
meanings.sent1: He facelifts to improve his self-confidence.
meanings.sent2: She facelifts every few years to maintain her beauty.
meanings.sent3: The idea of him getting facelifts made his friends chuckle.
meanings.sent4: Her decision to facelifts surprised everyone around her.
meanings.sent5: Facelifts can greatly change how a person feels about themselves.
